title: [MINOR/CLIENT] Blurry interface
body: A lot of the images and text appears blurry after playing a game. The blurred areas become sharper/vice-versa when moving the mouse around the client.

replies.body:
If you have a Nvidia graphics card, try going into the Nvidia control panel  -> Manage 3D settings -> Program Settings Tab -> Select the League of Legends client ( If it's not in the drop down tab you'll have to add it).   ->  Disable "Antialiasing - FXAA"  -> Select Apply

This fixed the blurry issue for me, hope it helps.

If you're trying to show that something is blurry, I would recommend saving the screenshots in PNG format rather than JPG (I'm guessing you used Windows Paint for these, which lacks customizable quality settings for JPG and will use very aggressive compression).
